openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_get_root(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_get_topic(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_get_topic_hierarchy(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This block tag will grab the parent of a topic. Each Topic object contains a parent or if a root node contains a null value. In this case the object returned is either that parent, or the None object.

{% pp_get_topic_hierarchy topic = object %}
Do stuff with {{ pp_topic.hierarchy }}

{% endpp_get_topic_hierarchy %}

openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_get_topic_if_content(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_get_topic_list(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This block tag will grab a list of topics. This also takes an argument ‘topic’ allowing the template to specify a root topic, in which case each child of this topic will be included in ‘children’.

In order to generate a url that will provide rng information to this tag via request.range, use a url tag of the following form:

{% url pp-page template=”filename.html” start=0 end=20 %}

In this way, the tag can be invoked as follows:

{% pp_get_topic_list range=request.range topic = root_topic %}
Do stuff with {{ pp_topic.topic_list }}

{% endpp_get_topic_list %}

>>> from pirate_issues.models import Topic
>>> topic = Topic(text = "newtopic")
>>> topic.save()
>>> topic2 = Topic(text = "childtopic", parent = topic)
>>> topic2.save()
>>> topic3 = Topic(text = "nexttopic", parent = topic2)
>>> Topic.objects.all()
[<Topic: taxes>, <Topic: debt>, <Topic: A test topic.>, <Topic: newtopic>, <Topic: childtopic>]
>>> Topic.clean_objects.filter(parent = topic)
[<Topic: childtopic>]
>>> Topic.clean_objects.filter(parent = Topic.objects.null_dimension())
[]
openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_getcreate_setting(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_mygroups(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_topics.templatetags.topictags.pp_setting_form(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This block tag can create or process forms eitfrom genericview.views import HttpRedirectException, namespace_gether to create or to modify arguments. Usage is as follows:

{% pp_topic_form POST=request.POST path=request.path topic=pp_topic.topic root=some_topic %}
Do stuff with {{ pp_topic.form }}.

{% endpp_topic_form %}

This block tag can create or process forms eitfrom genericview.views import HttpRedirectException, namespace_gether to create or to modify arguments. Usage is as follows:

{% endpp_topic_form %}
